name: Super Black Belt Karate
overview: Super Black Belt Karate is 1983 fighting game for 1 or 2 players It was developed by Emilio Sotolongo and Lori Hidalgo, and was published by Computer Applications. Given the ever-increasing delinquency, you have decided to enroll in a martial arts school, where you can learn all the techniques that will be useful for the defense of your belongings or better of your person. By practicing against the computer or a friend you will have to use all your skill, alertness and cunning to be able to face and annihilate your opponent. Insist on training, because good results are only achieved with patience and perseverance and you will see that this game will thrill you a lot. Published in Italy as Banzai in both Hit Parade C64 n.11 (Aprile 1987) and in Special Program n.23 (giugno 1986).
